title: 4 Bedroom Duplex - Lakewood
housing_type: application fee details: $35 Application fee for household members over 18
app_fee: $35 Application fee for household members over 18
posting_body: East side of a duplex with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms located on a cul-de-sac.
This is a bi-level home with covered deck on back overlooking a fenced back yard with a large shade tree.
Two bedrooms upstairs and 2 bedrooms downstairs with a family room and separate laundry room.
Extra outdoor storage under deck in enclosed area.
2-car driveway in front of unit.
Residents pay own electricity/gas and split water bill with neighbor.
Landscaping and snow removal provided at no cost to the residents.
Fresh paint throughout unit.
New carpet in upstairs with laminate flooring downstairs.
Large kitchen with over the stove microwave.
Close to Sheridan and all shopping amenities.
Easy access to 6th Ave and I-25.
Twenty minutes to the mountains.
No cats allowed.
Small dog (40 #’s or less considered with references).
Extra pet deposit of $300 and monthly pet rent of $25 if dog approved.
Looking for household that has combined monthly gross income of $6,750 and good landlord references.
Residents responsible for all utilities (1/2 monthly water and trash bill).
Schools are Molholm Elementary School, Everett Middle School and Jefferson High School.
Shown by SWAN Enterprises & Consulting LLC, Teri Marquantte Broker
